title: Symbolic Link (Symlink)
subtext: A file pointing to another file or directory
author: RayMathew

description.title: Symbolic Link (Symlink)
texts: A symbolic link (also symlink or soft link) is a file whose purpose is to point to a file or directory (called the 'target') by specifying a path thereto.
Symlinks in Linux are similar to shortcuts in Windows.
